**Value Range**:
| naming conventions:
| *"sync"* - synchronous generator
| *"async"* - asynchronous generator

**Explanation**: the real power of the generator [kW]
voltage set point of the generator [p.u]
minimal reactive power of the generator [kVar]
maximal reactive power of the generator [kVar]
scaling factor for the active power
specifies if the generator is in service. Only in service elements are considered during loadflow calculation
